definition: "Weswegen" is typically used to inquire about the reason or cause behind a particular situation or action. It is commonly employed in interrogative sentences to ask for an explanation or motive.

examples.german: Weswegen bist du so spät gekommen?
examples.english: Why did you come so late?

examples.german: Ich verstehe nicht, weswegen er so wütend ist.
examples.english: I don't understand why he is so angry.

examples.german: Weswegen hast du das Buch nicht gelesen?
examples.english: Why didn't you read the book?

examples.german: Weswegen hast du dich entschieden, nach Deutschland zu ziehen?
examples.english: Why did you decide to move to Germany?

examples.german: Weswegen hast du den Job gekündigt?
examples.english: Why did you quit the job?
